text: New research by @TheLancet on #hydroxychloroquine / #chloroquine shows no conclusive evidence of their benefit 'Each of these drug regimens was associated with decreased in-hospital survival and an increased frequency of ventricular arrhythmias' #Covid19🦠 https://t.co/aBJIXgpjV5 https://t.co/hIgbHOkA8a
